name: C64 Annotate
tagline: Create annotation for C64 assembler code
body:
### C64 Annotate
This web application will allow you to load a [VICE Emulator](http://vice-emu.sourceforge.net/) snapshot and will show you a memory map of the state of the computer. Once the map is created you will be able to select memory ranges to disassemble and add annotations and comments to the disassembled output. In addition the web-app will automatically label and add documentation information to addresses that have specific meaning to a Commodore 64: for example, VIC 2 register addresses will be replaced with meaningful names.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
